title: Re: Erik (Was Re: Allegro CL 5.0 Win32)
content:
Subject: Re: Erik (Was Re: Allegro CL 5.0 Win32)
From: Erik Naggum <erik@naggum.no>
Date: 2000/03/05
Newsgroups: comp.lang.lisp
Message-ID: <3161258797199263@naggum.no>

* Kenneth P. Turvey
| He brings it on himself.

  and in what way didn't you bring what you got on yourself?

  it's _so_ amusing to watch people who can't think in principles, but let
  their stupid likes and dislikes of other _people_ judge their reactions
  to what they _do_.  some day, you'll figure out what this means, Kenneth.

#:Erik
author: Erik Naggum
